title: Looking to buy P2 Sweet Caporal pins to complete my set

posts.post_title: Looking to buy P2 Sweet Caporal pins to complete my set
posts.post_content:
Anyone out there with the following pins they might want to sell and help out a collector? I still need: Erwin, Marquard, Needham, Wagner (Heinie) and Warhop. Thanks!!!
